title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added two new calculators for secret protection: ROI calculator for push protection savings and pricing calculator for secret protection costs.
Updated documentation to include the new calculators in the secret risk assessment section.
Introduced a customization library for Copilot with examples of custom instructions and prompt files.
Added path-specific instructions for accessibility, testing, and GitHub Actions workflows.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
